//가이드 영문 텍스트 I downloaded it, but I'm not sure where to start. What exactly does this app do? What should i do? We have created a guide to help those who are in trouble to use it more smoothly. Use 'hey buddy' more easier. Shall we start with the feed? 1.Browse the feed and find someone you like. The feed is where you can see photos of others. Look at their photos and find your favorite places, restaurants, events and more. Feeds can be sorted in two ways. The order of the latest and the likes. You can see the feeds sorted according to your choice, and you can move the details of the feeds and move the author's profile.
How to use feed 1. Use the buttons at the top to select the sort
 you want. 2. Click the photo to see the original image. 
 If you touch the feed, you can see the entire contents
 of the feed. 3. If you go to others profile, You can see the feeds
 that the person has written, and tap the feed photo
 to see the entire contents.. 4. You can send a friend request directly from profile,
 or you can put it on your wish list and make a friend
 later. If you go to your profile, you can see the feeds you liked. By setting the matching conditions, you can select the kind of users you want. Let's find a match for you By setting matching conditions, you can find people who meet the conditions. Go matching set in menu, set your language, areas
 of interest, duration of travel, and select the
 region to visit. When all conditions are selected, click the complete
 button. Then you can choose users will be displayed.
 Tap the user and check the feed in their profile.
 If the feeds are interesting" If you add a friend, you should also have a conversation. Now chat with a friend. When you come to Korea for a trip, a friend you made in advance will help. You can ask about tourist spots, and you can ask about small things like restaurants and trails. In addition, there are various problems that you may experience suddenly.
When you enter the menu matching list, matched
 friends appear. Tap the friend to go to the chat
 window and have a conversation. Was the guide helpful? you can use it easy. Now try the matching by following the sequence. There will be a good meeting. App Evaluation Declaration Matching End
